text: Nordland II is the twelfth studio album by the Swedish extreme metal band Bathory. It was released on 31 March 2003 through Black Mark Productions. The album is mainly viking metal, so the songs have lyrics about Norse mythology. The album was the second in a two-album set, and no plans for Nordland III ever existed. == Track listing == == People == * Quorthon – all instruments * Kristian Wåhlin – album cover artwork == References == Category:2003 albums
title: Nordland II
